LanguageData.Cook5MealSimple.label: cook simple meals in bulk (5)
LanguageData.Cook5MealSimple.description: Cooks straightforward meals from one ingredient.
LanguageData.Cook5MealFine.label: cook fine meals in bulk (5)
LanguageData.Cook5MealFine.description: Cooks somewhat complex meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients.
LanguageData.Cook5MealLavish.label: cook lavish meals in bulk (5)
LanguageData.Cook5MealLavish.description: Cooks very complex meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.Cook5MealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival meals in bulk (5)
LanguageData.Cook5MealSurvival.description: Cooks a packaged survival meals from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.Make6Kibble.label: make kibble in bulk (300)
LanguageData.Make6Kibble.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants.
LanguageData.Make9Pemmican.label: make pemmican in bulk (10)
LanguageData.Make9Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
